name: DRIP DRIP DRIP
description:
A microgame about existential dread.

CONTROLS
Left / Right Arrows to move.
Space to jump.
W to whistle.
S to start.
ESC to pause.

This game takes about 5 minutes (if you dont die).
The game has an ending.
Please play with sound. 

CREDITS
Made in January 2022 by Torben Bökemeyer.
torbenboekemeyer.me | Instagram | Twitter
